sentences.en: Analyzing landslide slippage surface and the geological characteristic, confirmed it's entirely process.
sentences.cn: 通过对采动滑坡的滑面及各种地质特性分析, 确定了滑坡的发展全过程.

sentences.en: Anything less and he'll be eaten alive by slippage, commissions, and expenses.
sentences.cn: 少了任何一点,他就会被滑点亏损, 佣金和费用给生吞了.

sentences.en: Expenses for commissions and slippage are higher, due to more frequent trading.
sentences.cn: 佣金和滑点的费用很高, 因为交易太频繁了.

sentences.en: In any event slippage shall be a concern.
sentences.cn: 延误,在任何情况下,应关注的问题.

sentences.en: In the bull market in stocks must first a sense of slippage.
sentences.cn: 在牛市中炒股首先要树立止损和止赢意识.

sentences.en: Incorrect use can lead to condom slippage or breakage.
sentences.cn: 不正确的使用会导致安全套滑脱或破裂.

sentences.en: One mode is slippage along the discontinuity provided by the lubricated fault plane.
sentences.cn: 其中一种方式是沿着润滑的断层面所形成的间断面而发生滑动.

sentences.en: Slippage depends on the state of market participants.
sentences.cn: 滑点就是由市场参与者的情绪造成的.

sentences.en: Slippage tends a much bigger expense than commissions.
sentences.cn: 一般滑点亏损比手续费还严重.

sentences.en: These forces may cause fiber slippage within the yarn structure.
sentences.cn: 这些力会引起纱线结构内部纤维的滑脱.
这种情况被称为对冲打滑.

sentences.en: This is probably the result of slippage of cells alongside each other.
sentences.cn: 这可能是由于彼此相依的肌细胞错开.

sentences.en: This slow slippage has important theoretical consequences.
sentences.cn: 这种缓慢的滑动有重要的理论意义.

sentences.en: We want to stop the slippage of the quality of public services.
sentences.cn: 我们想要止住公共服务质量下滑的局面。

sentences.en: You'll get out, but expect to suffer slippage in a fast - moving market.
sentences.cn: 你会出场, 但是,在快速波动的市场,你会受到滑点亏损.
